1b57781ab048599c0618fa4387215aa421124c6a.query:
SELECT
                    u.id as "id: UserId"
                FROM
                    users u
                WHERE
                    u.uid = $1

4b09bcb1e2b22f9c77ff526e735da2db64184396.query:
DELETE FROM
                    tasks t
                WHERE
                    t.id = $2 AND
                    (
                        t.responsible_user_id = $1 OR
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                tasks_groups tg
                            INNER JOIN
                                users_groups ug ON
                                    ug.group_id = tg.group_id
                            WHERE
                                ug.user_id = $1
                        )
                    )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: TaskId"

4ebe4f8512bab12d12bef9622cb8a2abd1dcb7d4.query:
DELETE FROM
                    groups g
                WHERE
                    id = $1 AND
                    NOT EXISTS (
                        SELECT
                        FROM
                            users_groups ug
                        WHERE
                            ug.group_id = g.id
                    )

750bfbbfcf1c2d3892e33262053754b11b89583d.query:
SELECT
                    g.id as "id: GroupId",
                    g.title
                FROM
                    groups g
                INNER JOIN
                    users_groups ug ON
                        ug.group_id = g.id
                WHERE
                    ug.user_id = $1

8221e03847bc8f03d55fd449f3830f2a745c6d04.query:
UPDATE
                    groups g
                SET
                    title = $3
                WHERE
                    g.id = $2 AND
                    EXISTS (
                        SELECT
                        FROM
                            users_groups ug
                        WHERE
                            ug.group_id = g.id AND
                            ug.user_id = $1
                    )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: GroupId",
                    title

875656f3926f66d07ef733001145c0e2c55a7b02.query:
UPDATE
                    tasks t
                SET
                    completed_at = CASE
                        WHEN $3 THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC'
                        ELSE NULL
                    END
                WHERE
                    t.id = $2 AND
                    (
                        t.responsible_user_id = $1 OR
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                tasks_groups tg
                            INNER JOIN
                                users_groups ug ON
                                    ug.group_id = tg.group_id
                            WHERE
                                ug.user_id = $1
                        )
                    )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: TaskId",
                    completed_at

98910ee7914b032fe69d4e13dd98f6d6ac0b6dbc.query:
SELECT
                    t.id as "id: TaskId",
                    t.title,
                    t.completed_at,
                    t.start_date,
                    t.end_date
                FROM
                    tasks t
                WHERE
                    (
                        t.completed_at IS NULL OR
                        t.completed_at > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 day'
                    ) AND
                    (
                        t.responsible_user_id = $1 OR
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                tasks_groups tg
                            INNER JOIN
                                users_groups ug ON
                                    ug.group_id = tg.group_id
                            WHERE
                                ug.user_id = $1
                        )
                    )

9a9577d0e3bf001ea543b7dbb54e0e40c03796a4.query:
INSERT INTO users (
                    uid,
                    name,
                    picture_url
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1,
                    $2,
                    $3
                )
                ON CONFLICT (uid) DO UPDATE SET
                    name = $2,
                    picture_url = $3
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: UserId",
                    uid,
                    name,
                    picture_url

bb6f480e6ba0f41c183e174899512895064c8aad.query:
INSERT INTO groups (
                    title
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1
                )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: GroupId",
                    title

c42b3fe3bb44ec88e797bcba34bd09e399ee1feb.query:
DELETE FROM
                    users_groups ug
                WHERE
                    ug.user_id = $1 AND
                    ug.group_id = $2

c69f2e7d3374e4881e9f0b7d13351e8646b318f1.query:
INSERT INTO users_groups (
                    user_id,
                    group_id
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1,
                    $2
                )

d2d48cd0e5ddd45ad2f229d4f2c9e5e23df718c7.query:
UPDATE
                    tasks t
                SET
                    title = $3,
                    start_date = $4,
                    end_date = $5
                WHERE
                    t.id = $2 AND
                    (
                        t.responsible_user_id = $1 OR
                        EXISTS (
                            SELECT
                            FROM
                                tasks_groups tg
                            INNER JOIN
                                users_groups ug ON
                                    ug.group_id = tg.group_id
                            WHERE
                                ug.user_id = $1
                        )
                    )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: TaskId",
                    title,
                    completed_at,
                    start_date,
                    end_date

e3f70c33fe5269cffc83df9d97005dab307f45d9.query:
INSERT INTO tasks (
                    responsible_user_id,
                    title,
                    start_date,
                    end_date
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1,
                    $2,
                    $3,
                    $4
                )
                RETURNING
                    id as "id: TaskId",
                    title,
                    completed_at,
                    start_date,
                    end_date
